body: https://twitter.com/katsurai/status/1531919684949667840 | Finally a new chapter, after how many months. The latest Comic ExE (May 31st). One of the tweet replied “Return of the King” XD | Unfortunately, rather than second part of Kuou’s story (Hibiki’s elder sister), it’s a side story of Ayumi (Hibiki’s short haired friend). | BTW, still imagined the main route is just between Hibiki and Lilith. The other girls just felt like side conquest but won’t have any scenario with significant ending. Well, Reina is probably close enough.
The artists behind this doujin seems currently focusing on another project (LN Stuff) so we might not be able to see a continuation for this doujin for a while
Masterpiece. Can't count how many times I came back here.
Waiting for the next chapter with the two blackhaired sisters...
Didn't she originally have black/blue hair? Wish katsurai continued this, he recently made ntr stuff instead.

I actually got my hopes up seeing this, thinking that it might contain the next chapter of the series.




I was dead wrong.
i miss this doujinshi pls update it Katsurai Yoshiaki senpai <3
continue the series, dammit! what's Katsurai Yoshiaki doing now? drawing manga/novel illustration, huh?
